metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29916 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Firefox behaved slightly differently for already known resources whenloading CSS resources involving CSS variables. This could have been used toprobe the browser history. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.9,Firefox ESR < 91.9, and Firefox < 100.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
